column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The first two are huge strikes for me as I thought those would be no brainers for such a successful and hyped restaurant.  The chocolate pie
column3: was practically inedible... the crust was so hard that I had to wrap my fist around my fork and stab straight down into it to break it apart several times
column4: and the fudge filling was immensely thick and sticky.  It was all around uptight and needed to unwind a bit
